content: The duration of tours of the orangutan rehabilitation center in Kalimantan can vary depending on the tour operators and the specific itinerary you choose. However, most tours range from half a day to a few days. A typical day tour may last around 6-8 hours, while longer tours may last up to 3 days or more. Some tours also include additional activities and destinations such as boat rides, jungle treks, and visits to local villages, which can extend the duration of the tour. It's best to check with the tour operator for specific details of their itinerary and duration.
